Class Navigation

    This class controls the navigation of the robot

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
            double y,
            boolean avoidObstable)
        Travel to the destination. Will travel first along y axis and then x axis
        Parameters:
        x - - destination x
        y - - destination y
        avoidObstable - - whether or not avoid obstacle
